steps.title: Welcome to Spec Review!
steps.content:
This tool helps teams collaborate on requirement documents through comments, status changes, and approval workflows.

All your work is automatically saved and synced via git.

steps.title: Set Your Username
Review Packages
steps.content:
Packages group related REQs for review. Common uses:

- Sprint reviews
- Release preparation
- Feature-specific reviews

Create a package first, then add REQs and comments to it. Packages can be archived when complete.

steps.title: Adding Comments
steps.content:
Click any REQ, then use the review panel to add comments.

Comment types:
- **General**: Whole REQ
- **Line**: Specific line
- **Block**: Line range
- **Word**: Specific text

Comments are git-backed and collaborative!

steps.title: Working Together
steps.content:
Each reviewer has their own branch:

  reviews/my-package/alice
  reviews/my-package/bob

Click "Fetch All" to see everyone's comments merged together.

Resolve threads when issues are addressed.

completion.title: You're Ready!
completion.content:
You've completed the quick tour. Here are some tips:

- Click the **?** icon anytime for help
- Hover over controls for tooltips
- Check the User Guide for detailed info

Happy reviewing!
